name: Jack or Wolf?
description:
This game was made for the 2020 GMTK Jam.

Your name is Jack and your village is being attacked by 4 werewolves (including yourself). Your aim is to bring back all the villagers to safety in their homes. You can use your environment to temporarily block the wolves. But beware because every thirty seconds, your thirst for villager blood awakes, and you lose all control.

Controls:

-WASD or arrows to move

-LEFT click to interact with yellow objects

-LEFT click to knock back werewolves

-LEFT click to pick up villagers

-RIGHT click to let go of villagers

This game was made in a team of 3 (PoweredBySalt, miam-miam and Bobnotarobot)

We hope you enjoy our game as much as we had fun making it!
